channel.title: Bash on Lance Wonderland
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on Lance Wonderland

item.title: Unix Command Line
item.description: ls > stands for “list” > lists the contents of a directory ls -l > long listing format > gives additional info of files, size, date of last exist…. ls -lh > long listing format + print human readable format ls -lSh > sorted by the size and then by the date of exist time ls [another directory] cd > change directory pwd > print whole pathname of current directory
